member.name: P:JetBrains.dotCover.CoverageTree.Model.Interface.QuickSearchMatchingIdSet.MatchingIds
member.summary: Ids for nodes which match quick search filter

member.name: P:JetBrains.dotCover.CoverageTree.Model.Interface.QuickSearchMatchingIdSet.ParentIds

member.name: T:JetBrains.dotCover.CoverageTree.Model.Interface.ITransientCoverageTree
member.summary: Transient raw metadata-based coverage tree without additional processing of type members. Constructed on demand, each time from the scratch.

member.name: M:JetBrains.dotCover.CoverageTree.Model.Interface.Nodes.CoverageNodeKind.GetCoverageNodeKindIdByName(System.String)
member.summary: Calculates coverage node kind's id as the hash code of its name. We can't use standard String.GetHashCode because its result is platform-dependent and differs on the 32-bit and 64-bit versions of the .NET Framework.

member.name: T:JetBrains.dotCover.CoverageTree.Model.GroupFilter
member.summary: Available group filters are obtained from snapshot
